name: Shi-be
tagline: The Sustainable Horizons Institute (http://shinstitute.org/) is committed to fostering sustainable mentoring activities to promote diversity and inclusion in the fields of Science and technology. Here is a place for us to keep track of all ongoing projects and accomplished milestones.
body:
# SHI-BE
The Sustainable Horizons Institute (http://shinstitute.org/) is committed to fostering sustainable mentoring activities to promote diversity and inclusion in the fields of Science and technology. Here is a place for us to keep track of all ongoing projects and accomplished milestones.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
